
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(purebench)
target_compile_options(purebench PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_link_libraries(purebench PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-getopt
  library-cpp-svnversion
  yql-utils-backtrace
  yql-utils-log
  yql-public-udf
  udf-service-exception_policy
  library-cpp-skiff
  library-cpp-yson
  purecalc-io_specs-mkql
  yql-public-purecalc
)
target_link_options(purebench PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)
target_sources(purebench PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/tools/purebench/purebench.cpp
)
target_allocator(purebench
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)
vcs_info(purebench)
